episodes.title: Abused By My Doctor: My Horrific Therapy Experience - A Cult for One #therapyabuse #therapy #abuse
episodes.description:
You’re not alone. In this video, I'll share my terrible experience with abuse by my psychologist. I went to therapy for child abuse and unfortunately my doctor was an actual psychopath. Narcissistic abuse in therapy by psychologists and therapists is far more common than most realize. Sadly, patients and victims are often confused and ashamed and reluctant to file reports.

I suffered seizures, brain fog, memory loss, panic attacks, horrible depression. It destroyed my marriage and caused irreparable damage to many people I love most.

✨ABOUT ME ✨
Hey, I'm Carolyn - a photographer, actor, a survivor of therapy abuse, a mom on the spectrum (AuDHD), a filmmaker, and crochet lover; creating a soft, real space for anyone healing or feeling overwhelmed by the noise of the patriarchy. I aim to bring you all comfort, clarity, empathy and strength to create your own boundaries in your life.

✨NEED HELP? ✨
Current responder and provider of peer support for victims of therapy abuse with the incredible women at TELL: https://www.therapyabuse.org/about_us.... 

✨SUPPORT MY WORK ✨
Buy me a coffee: https://buymeacoffee.com/hooksandconf...
